CustomField.description: When selected, applies this brand to the entire Customer Engagement Solution when the custom setting "Multiple Institutions Enabled" is disabled. If “Multiple Institutions Enabled” is enabled, the brand specified for each institution overrides this flag.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When selected, applies this brand to the entire Customer Engagement Solution when the custom setting "Multiple Institutions Enabled" is disabled. If “Multiple Institutions Enabled” is enabled, the brand specified for each institution overrides this flag.
CustomField.label: Is Applied
